entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 39 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 34. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
